title: HateDaddys pro as heck guide to being really hard to kill.
body:
I play meowkai, merphert (sry s2 syndrome, OMG merpherts orpen perk herm ner) n other shit 

BASICALLY UR AN OG GANGSTA AND U REP UR SET BUT THESE GRUNT WORKERS TRY 2 DISRESPECT U SO U NEED TO ARMOR UP UR ENVOY SO YOU CAN POP A DRIVEBY AND EARN BACK YOUR SET AND RESPEK ON UR NAME

WHAT NOT TO BUILD: {{item:3075}} 

DONT EVER BUILD THIS SHIT AS YR FIRST ITEM. SHITS GARBAGE UNLESS YOU STACK ARMOR AND YOU NEED TO PRIORITIZE HP AND ARMOR TOGETHER. 

SHIT YOU SHOULD BE BUILDING:

A) DO THEY HIT ME WITH STICKS AND PHYSICAL SHIT?

IF SO, THIS SHIT IS BROKEN:

{{item:3068}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3742}} 

DO THEY DO CRIP DAMAGE? IF SO, THIS ITEM REDUCES CRIP DAMAGE SO GET IT FIRST:

{{item:3143}} 

IF NOT, DEPENDING ON WHAT HOOD YOU REP U MIGHT GET THIS SHOULDER PAD OR BLOODFIRE CAPE CUZ UR A BLOOD. BUT MOST IMPORTANTLY, UNDERSTAND UR NOT ALWAYS FORCED TO BUILD THESE 3 GANGSTER ASS ITEMS RIGHT AWAY. UNDERSTAND THE FLOW OF THE GAME AND IF UR DOING WELL, U MIGHT BE SAFE ENOUGH TO BUILD DAMAGE AND RUN THE ENTIRE BLOCK, OTHERWISE MAKE SURE U ARE BUILDING HEALTH BECAUSE AFTER ALL, ARMOR IS NICE BUT IF U AINT GOT NO HEALTH, U DONT LIVE LONG ENOUGH TO RUN YOUR BLOCK.

THIS SHIT IS BROKEN: {{item:3047}} 

EVERYONE IS SCARED IF A NINJA GANGSTER AND IF U GET THESE, U GET IMMEDIATE RESPECT IN UR HOOD

SOMETIMES U MIGHT BE ABLE TO RUSH TO THE ICE CREAM TRUCK AND BUY THESE

{{item:3025}} BLUE BRASS KNUCKLES
{{item:3110}} BLUEBERRY SLUSHY 

REMEMBER U DONT ALWAYS GET THESE THO CUZ U MIGHT NEED HP MORE BUT SOME CHAMPIONS LIKE {{champion:75}} WANT THE CRIPDOWN REDUCTION. REMEMBER HP IS IMPORTANT BUT HP ISNT JUST SOMETHING THATS ALWAYS ON UR GREEN GANGSTER BAR, SOMETIMES ITS ON YOUR ABILITIES TO STICTH URSELF UP LIKE ANTON CHIGUR IN A FIGHT AND HEAL AS UR DOING IT. 

NOW ONTO B)

IF THEY DO WIZARD DAMAGE CUZ THEY OGS, THEN BUILD {{item:3065}} IF U GOOD AT STITCHING URSELF UP OTHERWISE CONSIDER BUILDING {{item:3102}} BECAUSE THIS CHAIN AND CHARM IS OP AND GIVES U LOTS OF MALICE RESIST FROM THE WIZARD DAMAGE BUT MAKE SURE U BUY IT WHEN U GOT GOOD HEALTH. OTHERWISE U AINT GOT ENOUGH HEALTH 

SOMETIMES U CAN ALSO BUILD SKULL STICK AKA {{item:3001}} IF U KNOW A LIL WIZARD STUFF AND OTHER OPTIONS LIKE {{item:3512}} {{item:3026}} ARE OK FOR HYBRID SET DEFENSES BUT MAKE SURE U HAVE HP AGAIN CUZ ITS IMPORTANT, U USUALLY
WANT AROUND 3600-4200 HP FULL BUILD AND AROUND 3K HP AROUND 24 MINUTES U FEEL ME? SO JUST WATCH UR BACK AND UNDERSTAND THIS IS UR SET 

TO BREAK DOWN WHAT YOU SHOULD BE STRAPPED WITH, HERES WHAT U CAN LOOK LIKE

Heavy physical damage enemy team:
{{item:3047}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3143}} SHOULD BE YOUR CORE

Consider: {{item:3742}} for a good mixture of hp armor 

This opens up the possibility to build damage items or other armor items that give no hp but other benefits like frozen hearts CDR and AS Slow aura. 

Mixed damage team:

again, {{item:3143}} and {{item:3068}} are likely your core armor items and if they have heavy crit, consider getting randuins first, especially if laning vs a crit champion or if the enemy crit champion is snowballing. Otherwise, try to go for sunfire first because bamis cinder gives you so much lane presence. 

Typically you'll build {{item:3065}} and/or {{item:3102}} 

When to consider {{item:3065} or {{item:3102}} : if you have innate healing, need more HP than MR or at least a decent mixture and if you really value 10% CDR. If you don't value 10% CDR that much, consider {{item:3102}} especially if you're going to be getting HP from other items because the MR values it gives and it's build path are disgustingly good for mitigating magic damage.

If one MR item isn't enough then get both, but typically it will be unless they have sustained AP damage dealers like {{champion:13}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:8}} etc. And honestly, {{item:3190}} isn't bad as a second or even 3rd MR options even if an ally is getting it because the auras stack on the champions who hold the lockets:

What to build if the enemy is heavy AP:

{{item:3065}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3111}} 

Pick 3 of the 4 and build them. As a tank, I really don't consider {{item:3111}} very often unless I plan on doing nothing but diving backlines because {{item:3047}} are so damn good against ADCs. 

You can consider magic damage oriented MR items like {{item:3001}} and likely want to consider {{item:3060}} if you have AP ratios (as a tank you generally do) because this is so good at fucking over AP heavy comps and their wave clear. 

SO NOW U READ THIS SHIT N U A PRO TANKSTER

REP UR HOOD AND STAY BLESSED YALL IM OUT

Which brings me to the point: it is baffling that so many players, even players outside of bronze, have no idea how to itemize.

I have seen so many Malphite players with dumbass builds like this be completely dumbfounded when they get blown up.
